column1: #text=I was talking to my friend the other day and she told me about a book that she thought was very interesting .
#text=I decided I could borrow the book from the library .
#text=I went to my local library and had to sign up as a member because I previously was not a member .
#text=After signing up for a membership , I now had two options ; I could ask the librarian for help , or I could use the self service computers and find the location of my book on my own .
#text=I chose to find the book on my own , because if I can avoid dealing with people I will always pick that option .
#text=So I go on the computer and type the name of the book in .
#text=It tells me the location the book should be in .
#text=I find the book right where it 's supposed to be .
#text=Last , I check the book out at the front desk .
#text=I will have to return it in 1 week or I will be charged a fee .
